Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_end_3D_sample

The function AIL_end_3D_sample completely ends playback of the specified sample handle.

void AIL_end_3D_sample(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to be ended.

Discussion

Once a sample handle is ended, its status is set to SMP_DONE. The only way to then replay the sample is to call AIL_set_3D_sample_file and AIL_start_3D_sample again.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_status, AIL_resume_3D_sample, AIL_set_3D_sample_file, AIL_start_3D_sample, AIL_stop_3D_sample
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, MILES_DIGITAL_STATUS, void
